text: "Lemme See" is a song by American singer Usher. It was released from his album Looking 4 Myself (2012). It features rapper Rick Ross. "Lemme See" became the third single from the album. It was released on May 8, 2012. The music video was released on June 14, 2012. ==Charts== Chart (2012) Peak position UK Singles (Official Charts Company) 90 ==Release history== Country Date Format United States May 8, 2012 Urban radio May 22, 2012 Rhythmic radio ==References== Category:2012 songs Category:Usher songs
title: Lemme See
